Oranolio Protocol / Glossary

EWHORING GLOSSARY

Complete dictionary of terms, slang, and concepts.

Understanding the terminology is half the battle. This glossary covers everything from basic terms to advanced concepts. Use it as your reference guide.

Core Concepts

Basic

Ewhoring

Creating and monetizing fake female online personas, typically to extract money from lonely men on social platforms.

Basic

Persona

A complete fake identity including name, age, backstory, photos, and personality traits used in ewhoring operations.

Basic

Simp

Internet slang for men who are excessively attentive, submissive, or generous toward women, often online. Primary monetization targets.

Basic

Catfishing

Creating a fake online identity to deceive others, typically for financial gain. Ewhoring is a monetized form of catfishing.

Intermediate

GFE (Girlfriend Experience)

Monthly subscriptions where targets pay for ongoing attention, texts, and virtual girlfriend-like interactions.

Intermediate

Findom

Financial domination. Fetish where submissives pay dominants for the privilege of being financially controlled.

Intermediate

Pay Pig

Findom term for submissives who derive pleasure from giving money to dominants. High-value targets.

Intermediate

OpSec

Operational security. Measures taken to protect your real identity and maintain anonymity during operations.

Advanced

Multi-Persona Operation

Running multiple personas simultaneously across different platforms for maximum income diversification.

Advanced

Funnel Traffic

Using free platforms (like Reddit) to build credibility, then directing users to paid platforms (Discord, Telegram).

Advanced

Conversion Rate

Percentage of targets who become paying customers. Higher conversion = more efficient operations.

Platform Terms

Discord

Dating Server

Discord servers specifically for meeting romantic partners. High concentration of lonely, available targets.

Telegram

Premium Channel

Paid-access Telegram channels offering exclusive content, direct messaging, and VIP interactions.

OnlyFans

Faceless Account

OnlyFans creator account that never shows the operator's face, relying on body content and anonymity.

Reddit

Karma Farming

Building Reddit reputation through helpful posts and comments to establish credibility before funneling.

Payment Terms

Payments

Gift Cards

Amazon, Steam, iTunes cards. Safest payment method as they're untraceable and can't be reversed.

Payments

Crypto

Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDT. Anonymous and irreversible. Preferred for larger transactions.

Payments

CashApp/Venmo

Quick transfers but can be reversed. Use burner accounts only. Higher risk than gift cards.

Payments

Tribute

Findom term for payments made to dominants. Voluntary gifts as part of the fetish dynamic.
